::Necro Enari,once again sees Mosquitor run out to fire at more attackers::

Necro Enari-Hes an extremly loyal Predacon

::he takes off after him::

Necro Enari-Hey,I didnt hear anything from our commander,As soon as we wrap 
this up maybe we could have a little chat with her,im bored out of my 
mind,By the way,where are you going?


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sagefirestorm-Hmm,It is extremly quiet,but we cannot do this alone,It seems 
are Sage friends misled us about archangel and his group

Changeling-We have 3 choices,The Maximalls,Predacons or Alliance,We will 
have to join a side,but the question is who

Sagefirestorm-Well we opened fire on 2 Preds,so joining them wouldnt give us 
the warmest welcome,We havent seen much Alliance or Maximalls active in our 
area,We can think about this,Remember we have the ship,We could use 
practically anything to repair anyone of the vessels when we win,that puny 
thing,it was meant for a small group,not an entire fleet of these so we 
repair and head out,Lets think on this of a little while
